description.zh: CrewAI Studio 是一个基于 Streamlit 构建的用户友好型界面，用于与 CrewAI 进行交互，专为不想编写代码的用户设计。它让用户能够轻松定义和运行 AI 代理流程，并支持多种 LLM 提供商，提供知识源、自定义工具和后台任务执行等功能。
description.en: CrewAI Studio is a user-friendly interface built with Streamlit for interacting with CrewAI, designed for users who do not want to write code. It enables users to define and run AI agent workflows with ease. The platform supports multiple LLM providers and offers features like knowledge sources, custom tools, and background crew execution.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 让非开发者也能轻松创建和管理 AI 代理流程。
- 提供可视化、直观的界面用于构建 AI 应用。
- 支持多种部署和安装方式，具备高度灵活性。

## 功能列表:

- 跨平台支持：适用于 Windows、Linux 和 MacOS。
- 无需编码：通过用户友好界面与 CrewAI 交互。
- 支持 Conda 和虚拟环境：可选择使用 Conda 或 Python 虚拟环境进行安装。
- 结果历史记录：可以查看以前的运行结果。
- 知识源支持：可为代理团队添加知识源。
- CrewAI 工具：使用 CrewAI 工具与现实世界交互。
- 自定义工具：支持调用 API、写文件、增强代码解释器、增强网页爬虫等功能。
- 支持的 LLM 提供商：目前支持 OpenAI、Groq、Anthropic、ollama、Grok 和 LM Studio。
- 单页应用导出：可将代理流程导出为简单的单页 Streamlit 应用。
- 后台任务运行：代理任务可在后台运行并随时停止。
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Enables non-developers to easily create and manage AI agent workflows.
- Provides a visual and intuitive interface for building AI applications.
- Supports multiple deployment and installation methods for flexibility.

## Features:

- Multi-platform support: Works on Windows, Linux and MacOS.
- No coding required: User-friendly interface for interacting with CrewAI.
- Conda and virtual environment support: Choose between Conda and a Python virtual environment for installation.
- Results history: You can view previous results.
- Knowledge sources: You can add knowledge sources for your crews.
- CrewAI tools: You can use crewai tools to interact with real world.
- Custom Tools: Custom tools for calling APIs, writing files, enhanced code interpreter, enhanced web scraper...
- LLM providers supported: Currently OpenAI, Groq, Anthropic, ollama, Grok and LM Studio backends are supported.
- Single Page app export: Feature to export crew as simple single page streamlit app.
- Threaded crew run: Crews can run in background and can be stopped.
